questions.question: How do you make a Slip Knot?
questions.answer: Place hook on top of yarn, circle hook around to grab yarn, yarn over, pull through loop

questions.question: How do you make a Chain Stitch?
How do you make a Slip Stitch?
questions.answer: insert hook, yarn over, pull loop or all loops

questions.question: How do you make a Single Crochet?
questions.answer: yarn over, insert hook, pull through stitch, yarn over pull through two loops, yarn over, pull through remaining loops
